briefTitle: Artemisinin-Based Combination Therapy: Clinical Trials in Cameroon

outcomeMeasures.title: Cure Rate on Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: To evaluate the safety and antimalarial efficacy of two drug combinations: Artemether-Lumefantrine (AL) and Amodiaquine-Artesunate (AQ - AS) in Camaroonian patients in Mutengene, Bangolan and Garoua

outcomeMeasures.title: Cure Rate Day 14
outcomeMeasures.description: To evaluate antimalarial efficacy of AL and AQ-AS on day 14 post-treatment
